ComicInfo.Title: Tempest Fugit, Part 2 of 5
ComicInfo.Summary: Tempest Fugit, Part 2 of 5: Something strange is happening on the island where the Hulk keeps encountering past memories, including the earlier gray version of himself, and two other castaways meet General Thunderbolt Ross.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-18 01:25:55. [CVDB101161] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 18:53:32. [Issue ID 224437]
ComicInfo.Editor: Andy Schmidt,Joe Quesada,Molly Lazer,Nicole Wiley Boose,Tom Brevoort
ComicInfo.Characters: Ken (flashback),Fin Fang Foom (cameo),Miss Banner [Mrs. Drake] (flashback, Bruce's aunt),Carla (flashback),Ripley,General Thunderbolt Ross [Thaddeus Ross],Gwen,Mr. Guiness (flashback),Hulk [Bruce Banner]
